title: Topic 001 Question 056
body: You are troubleshooting a connection issue with a newly deployed Cloud SQL instance on Google Cloud. While investigating the Cloud SQL Proxy logs, you see the message Error 403: Access Not Configured. What should you do?
options: Check the app.yaml value cloud_sql_instances for a misspelled or incorrect instance connection name.
Check whether your service account has cloudsql.instances.connect permission.
Enable the Cloud SQL Admin API.
Ensure that you are using an external (public) IP address interface.
